question: this is my third baby boy. the first two I didn't have gd or SPD but was induced at 39 weeks. I'm 30 weeks this week and my Dr told me we will be inducing at 39 weeks because of the diabetes mostly. I really wanted to go in labor naturally though...my first two births were induced with no meds all natural but because I was induced labor was long and super intense... not wanting another 15 hr labor...
title: anyone have gd and being induced ??
